text: Cavernularia is a genus of marine cnidarians in the family Veretillidae.The pennatulacean genus Cavernularia Valenciennes (Octocorallia: Veretillidae). Gary C. Williams, Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society, April 1989, Volume 95, Issue 4, pages 285–310, The genus contains bioluminescent species. == Species == * Cavernularia capitata Williams, 1989 * Cavernularia chuni Kükenthal & Broch, 1911 * Cavernularia clavata Kükenthal & Broch, 1911 * Cavernularia dayi Tixier-Durivault, 1954 * Cavernularia dedeckeri Williams, 1989 * Cavernularia elegans (Herklots, 1858) * Cavernularia glans Kölliker, 1872 * Cavernularia habereri Moroff, 1902 * Cavernularia kuekenthali Lopez Gonzalez, Gili & Williams, 2000 * Cavernularia lutkenii Kölliker, 1872 * Cavernularia malabarica Fowler, 1894 * Cavernularia mirifica Tixier-Durivault, 1963 * Cavernularia obesa Valenciennes in Milne Edwards & Haime, 1850 * Cavernularia pusilla (Philippi, 1835) * Cavernularia vansyoci Williams, 2005 == References == == External links == * marinespecies * eol * recif- france.com Category:Veretillidae Category:Anthozoa genera Category:Bioluminescent cnidarians
title: Cavernularia (cnidarian)
